text: Steven Vincent Taylor (born 23 January 1986) is an English former professional footballer and Head Coach who played as a defender. He played over 200 games and 13 seasons in the Premier League with Newcastle United. ==Statistics== ===Career statistics=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League
